sentences.english: Once upon a time there was a doctor who was an expert at treating snakebites.
sentences.chinese: 從前有位醫生，十分擅長治療蛇毒。

sentences.english: The results show that Naja naja atra cobra venom injection is safe for therapeutic use.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果提示，蛇毒注射液用藥是安全的。

sentences.english: Effective and safe antivenoms requires international collaboration.
sentences.chinese: 提供有效並且安全的抗蛇毒血清，必須開展國際合作。

sentences.english: We need to treat you with tetanus vaccine and antivenin immediately.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要馬上給你注射破傷風疫苗和抗蛇毒血清。

sentences.english: In the venom of Trimeresurus stejnegeri exists a C type animal lectin.
sentences.chinese: 竹葉青蛇毒中存在一個C類動物凝集素。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efficacy of Snake-Venom Active Wine by aminal experiment.
sentences.chinese: 目的通過動物實驗，評價“蛇毒活性酒”的生物效應。

sentences.english: Objective To purify defibrase from snake venom of Agkistrodon acutus by affinity chromatography.
sentences.chinese: 目的用親和層析法從尖吻蝮蛇蛇毒中分離純化降纖酶。

sentences.english: ConclusionThe process can be used to purify rapidly the fibrinolytic enzyme from Gloydius saxatilis snake venom.
sentences.chinese: 結論此工藝可以快速純化黑眉蝮蛇蛇毒纖溶酶。

sentences.english: Objective Purificating no hemorrhage of fibrinolytic enzyme from Agkistrodon halys venom.
sentences.chinese: 目的從江浙蝮蛇蛇毒中純化出無出血毒的纖溶酶。

sentences.english: Darnell, who used to work in patent law, says he now spends about 75 percent of his time collecting snake venom.
Many countries have no access to the antivenoms they need.
sentences.chinese: 許多國家無從獲得所需要的抗蛇毒血清。

sentences.english: In particular, non-specific anti-venom serum for snake bite patients.
sentences.chinese: 尤其對無特異性抗蛇毒血清毒蛇咬傷的患者。

sentences.english: He used his medicines and magic spells to remove the poison from the suffering man.
sentences.chinese: 然後他用自己的藥和咒語爲那個受傷的人去掉了蛇毒。
達內爾是一位專業採蛇毒者。

definition: draw out pus by applying a plaster to the affected area
Deinagkistrodon, a venomous pit viper/also called five-paced viper (i.e. can grow to five paces)
to detoxify/to relieve fever (in Chinese medicine)
